extensionDescription.message: Ein Passwort Link aus ausgewähltem Text generieren.

menuitem_label.description: Context menu item label text for page.

fetch_error.message: Oh-oh, Fehler beim Erstellen der Kurz-URL.
fetch_error.description: Error message when shortening URL was unsuccessful.

service_title.description: Options: Label for selecting which service (pwpush, ...) to use.

service_custom.description: Options: Placeholder for custom URL option in dropdown.

customurl_title.description: Options: Label for custom URL text field.

customurl_title_preview.description: Options: Label for custom URL text field.

remove_whitespace_description.message: Entfernt leere Zeichen am Anfang und Ende des Textes.
remove_whitespace_description.description: Options: Help text for removing whitespace.

pwp_expire_after_days_description.message: Entfernt den link nach der angegebenen Anzahl von Tagen.
pwp_expire_after_days_description.description: Options: Expire secret link and delete after this many days.

expire_after_views_description.message: Entfernt den link nach der angegebenen Anzahl von Zugriffen.
expire_after_views_description.description: Options: Expire secret link and delete after this many views.

deletable_by_viewer_description.message: Erlaubt dem Empfänger den Link sofort zu löschen.
deletable_by_viewer_description.description: Options: Allow users to delete passwords once retrieved.

retrieval_step_description.message: Schutz gegen Chat-Systeme und URL-Scanner, die die Anzahl der Ansichten „auffressen“ können.
retrieval_step_description.description: Options: Helps to avoid chat systems and URL scanners from eating up views.

save_button.description: Options: Button label for save options.

saved_notice.description: Options: Indicator that options were saved.

copied_to_clipboard.description: Options: Indicator that link was copied to clipboard.
